text:
When passing properties to ant in command line the following will fail:
-Ddefect.list=DEF000111-DEF000112-D000113
Ant process is recognizing the -DEF... as a preperty called EF000111 for ex and
is trying to look for its value by searching for '='. Not '=' found, the parsing
fails.
Basically, a property should be identified by a ' -D' (space then -D) and not
just '-D'.
creator: tonyhaidamous@gmail.com
